loans.name: Eliana

texts.es: Eliana tiene 51 años y vive con su amado esposo Rosalindo de 56 años, ambos tienen 4 hijos Franklin de 16, Linger de 15, Madelin de 13 y Gisela de 9 años, ellos viven en la selva peruana (comunidad nativa centro Pumpuriani). Junto a su esposo, Eliana cada mañana sale hacia sus terrenos de cultivo, con sus herramientas de trabajo en mano, porque le gusta ver sus chacras siempre limpias, pues sabe por los 10 años de experiencia que tiene, que mientras más limpias estén sus cultivos de maíz, plátanos, yuca y café, producirán y podrán crecer fuertes y nutritivas, con ello asegurará que se venda a muy buen precio generándole más ingresos económicos. Hoy,  gracias al apoyo de su banco comunal viene incrementándose sus utilidades y  gracias a la buena administración de su esposo, su familia no pasa necesidades. Para su futuro ella desea plantar mayor cantidad de bananas y maíz hibrido, ya que está comprando poco a poco sus propios terrenos de cultivo, con la seguridad de que muy pronto será comerciante mayorista de frutos de la selva. Es el quinto crédito con MFP, y gracias a la ayuda de aquellas personas que hacen posible que acceda este préstamo que requiere; su banco comunal se hace  fuerte y muy bien conformado. Eliana, con el crédito que obtendrá comprará 150 plantas de plátano y varios sacos de abono orgánico, con los que está segura podrán tener buenas cosechas.
texts.en:
Eliana is 51 years old and lives with her beloved husband, Rosalindo, who is 56 years old. They have 4 children: Franklin, 16; Linger, 15; Madelin, 13; and Gisela who is 9. They live in the Peruvian jungle (in the rural community Pumpuriani). Together with her husband, every morning Eliana leaves for her farmland, with her work tools in hand, because she likes to see her farm always clean. As a result of her 10 years of experience she knows that the cleaner her crops of corn, bananas, yucca, and coffee are, they will produce and be able to grow stronger and more nutritious. And therefore, it will be assured that they'll sell at a very good price and generate more income.

Today, thanks to the support of her community bank, her profits keep increasing, and thanks to the good administration by her husband, her family doesn't have any needs. For the future, she wishes to plant a greater quantity of bananas and hybrid corn, since little by little she is buying her own farm land, with the security that very soon she will be a wholesale trader of jungle fruits. This is her fifth loan with MFP, and thanks to the help from the people who make it possible that she obtains the loan that she requires; her community bank makes her strong and very well satisfied. With the loan that she will receive, Eliana will buy 150 banana plants and several bags of organic fertilizer, with which she is sure she will be able to have good harvests.

loans.use: To buy 150 banana plants and bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Increase the selection and the stock of spurs

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 27 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo y a su hijos en el sector Pueblo Libre del distrito D. TambogranD., una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia D. Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más D. tres horas y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para efectuar servicios D. transporte) con la cual su esposo se encarga D. brindar servicio D. transporte D. carga y pasajeros. Adicionalmente cuentan con una pequeña parcela D. terreno en donD. siembran mango y limón para venderlos a las plantas procesadoras D. la zona.

Silvia desea realizar algunas reparaciones en su mototaxi ya que el continuo uso otrogado y el estado accidentado D. las carreteras han hecho que esta empiece a sufrir algunas fallas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria para poder mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en:
Silvia is 27 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children in the Pueblo Libre area of the TambogranD. district. It is an agricultural area located in the province of Piura, in the region of the same name. It is a little more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She has a motorcycle taxi ( a vehivle like a motorcycle that has a cabin attached to function as a transportation service) . Her husband is in charge of offering the transportation of cargo and passengers. They also have a small parcel of land where they grow mango and lemon to sell them to the area proessing plants. 

Silvia wants to do some repairs on the motorcycle taxi since its continuous use and the poor condition of the roads has maD. it start to suffer some damage. That it why is has been in her best interest to ask Edpyme Alternativa for the first time for a loan of 500 nuevos soles which will help her attain her goal.  

She is a very calm and resposnible woman. Her greatest wish is to keep growing as a business woman and be able to improve her quality of her life and her family's.

loans.use: Repair and maintenance expenses for a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Presentacion

texts.en:
Presentacion is fifty-eight years old.  He lives with his wife and children in the town of Pan de Azcuar in the district of Oyotun.  Oyotun is a rural area which consists of a long valley stretching through the foothills out into the northern Peruvian coastal plain.  It is fed by a river which provides for a rich agricultural history and good productivity.

Presentacion grows corn on a small plot near his home.  He has been growing corn for the last ten years and currently finds himself in need of a loan in order to purchase additional fertilizer and other products to protect and assist his crop in order to produce more.

This is Presentacion´s first loan with our institution.  He is thankful for the opportunity to receive credit at a lower cost due to the funding through Kiva.  He hopes that this will allow him improve his economic situation more rapidly.

loans.use: Purchase additional fertilizer and other products to protect and assist his crop in order to produce more

loans.name: Esmilda

texts.en:
Esmilda is thirty-nine years old.  She lives in her own home along with her children and husband.  They live in the town of Nanchoc in the district of Oyotun.  Oyotun is a rural area which consists of a long valley stretching through the foothills out into the northern Peruvian coastal plain.  It is fed by a river which provides for a rich agricultural history and good productivity.

Esmilda has managed a small beverage shop for the last ten years.  Her best selling product is beer.  She is well known in the area as a responsible seller.  She plans to use the loan proceeds to expand her inventory and take advantage of bulk price discounts.

She has worked with our institution in the past.  She is thankful for the opportunity to receive credit at a lower cost due to the funding through Kiva.

loans.use: Expand her inventory and take advantage of bulk price discounts

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 41 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el sector Vellecito del distrito D. TambogranD., una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia D. Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más D. tres horas y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza D. ganado vacuno, ella  aprovecha la leche que producen para comercializarla en la zona y también venD. sus animales a los negociantes que frecuentan la zona en donD. vive. Adicionalmente trabaja junto a su esposo en la agricultura: ambos poseen un pequeño terreno D. cultivo en donD. suelen sembrar limón y mango, los cuales ofrecen en venta a las plantas procesadoras D. la zona. Con los ingresos que perciben D. estas actividades ellos se encargan D. solventar la economía D. su familia.

Rosa desea brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos, asimismo desea invertir en la compra D. alimento balanceado para mejorar la producción D. sus animales. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles.

Rosa es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora. Junto a su esposo se esfuerzan diariamente para progresar y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 41 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children in the Vellecito area of the TambogranD. district. It is an agricultural area located in the province of Piura, in the region of the same name. It's a little more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She raises cattle and uses the milk they produce to sell in the area. She also sells her animals to the merchants who frequent the area where she lives. In addition, she works farming with her husband. They both own a small lot of cropland where they grow lemons and mangos. They sell these to the area processing plants. With he income they receive from these activities she manage the family budget.   

Rosa wants to maintain her crops. She also wants to invest in the purchase of balanced feed to improve her animal's production. For this, she has decided it's best to ask Edpyme Alternativa for the first time for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles.

Rosa is a hardworking woman who is a fighter. Together with her husband she works hard every day to progress and get her children ahead.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for her animals and to pay for repair expenses for her mango and lemon crops.

loans.name: Lila

texts.en:
Lila is seventy years old.  She lives with her husband and two children in the village Pan de Azucar in the district of Oyotun.  This is a rural town in a narrow valley between the coast and the mountains of northern Peru.  It is situated along a river that feeds a number of cities and a significant amount of agricultural land.

Lila raises animals in the yard behind her home.  She has been selling animals for the last ten years.  She sells her animals in the market of Cayalti which is a half hour away, or sometimes when the price is right, she will sell them to purchasers who pass through the town.  Lilia enjoys the process of raising animals and watching them grow.

She has previously received loans from our institution and she appreciates the opportunity to receive credit rapidly when the opportunity is appropriate.  She plans to use the loan to purchase additional animals and feed.  She hopes to be able to increase her income and take advantage of the higher prices that occur in the holiday season.  Lilia appreciates the opportunity to receive credit at a low cost through Kiva funding.

loans.use: Purchase additional animals and feed.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha tiene 37 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo en el sector La Pala del distrito D. TambogranD., una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia D. Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más D. tres horas y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta D. cerdos. Ella cria estos animales en algunos ambientes acondicionados en la parte posterior D. su domicilio y los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donD. vive. Adicionalmente cuenta con un negocio D. venta D. cerveza y chicha para el cual ha acondicionado una pequeña mesa en la parte exterior D. su domcilio.

Martha desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza D. sus lechones, D. modo que se puedan desarrollar D. mejor modo, ya que se acerca le fecha en la que tienen que ser destetados. Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.

Martha es una mujer bastante activa y que gusta mucho D. trabajar para ayudar a su esposo a salir adelante. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y le consideran una mujer D. confianza.
texts.en:
Martha is 37 years old, she is married and she lives together with her husband in the La Pala sector of the TambogranD. district. It is a primarily agricultural region located in the province of Piura, in the region of the same name. It is more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital city of Lambayeque.

She raises pigs for a living. She raises them in the rear section of her house and she sells them to the businessmen that visit the region where she lives. She also sells beer and chicha, a fermented maize drink. To accommodate her customers she has set up a small table in the exterior part of her home. 

Martha wishes to acquire balanced feed to raise her piglets in an efficient way and to help their development and prepare for the butchering season. To this end she requests a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles.

Martha is a very active woman and she very much enjoys her work and she supports her husband in meeting their responsibilities. Those that know Martha love her and consider her to be a trustworthy person.

loans.use: To purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.en:
Augusto is 32 years old. He lives in his own home in Diaz Orroego in the region of Oyotun with his wife and children. Oyotun is a rural area in the northern part of Peru, approximately one and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo. It is located in a fertile valley that is fed by water coming down from the mountains.
For the last ten years, Augusto and his family have run a small general store from their home. They sell basic household items such as soap, brushes, rice, and beverages as well as candy and sweets for the children. In addition to the store, Augusto has a plot of land, which he runs as a farm.
Augusto has taken out loans with our institution in the past. He appreciates having access to credit when the opportunity strikes. He plans to use his current loan to expand his offerings by purchasing additional merchandise at bulk prices. He is thankful for the opportunity to make use of a low cost product offered in partnership with Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase additional merchandise at bulk prices

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una madre de familia de 58 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus tres hijos en el sector Pueblo Libre del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia de Piura y que se encuentra ubicada en la región del mismo nombre, a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno lechero para comercializar la leche que producen. Ella cría sus animales en un área de terreno cercano a su vivienda y los alimenta de pastos naturales. La leche es vendida a sus vecinos y a un acopiador de la zona. Este negocio actualmente constituye su unico ingreso familiar ya que su esposo se encuentra enfermo de la columna y no puede trabajar. En todo momento ella es ayudada por sus hijos.

Santos desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo alimento balanceado para mejorar la producción de sus animales, por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa sacar adelante su negocio y lograr su meta.

Ella es una mujer luchadora y que se esfuerza a diario para sacar adelante a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es ver a su esposo sano. En la imagen aparece junto a dos de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Santos is a mother, she is 58 years old and she lives together with her husband and their three children in the Pueblo Libre sector of the district of Tambogrande. It is a primarily agricultural region located in the Province of Piura. It is more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo. 

She raises milk cows and she sells the milk they produce. She keeps her livestock in a piece of land near her home and she feeds them natural grasses.  She sells milk to her neighbors and to a distributor in the region. This business is the only source of income for the family because her husband has a bad back and he is unable to work. She always gets help from her children. 

Santos wishes to expand her business and to this end she requires balanced feed to improve milk production. She requests a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles. With this loan she will be able to develop her business and reach her goal. 

She is a very hard working person and she works every day to support her family. Her greatest dream is to see her husband healthy. She is photographed here together with two of her children.

loans.use: To purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos is 34 years old. He lives with his wife and children in Bolivar in the district of Cajamarca. This is a mountainous region in the northern part of Peru. It is primarily populated by individuals who raise corn.
Behind his house Marcos raises small animals such as ducks and chickens. The animals yield eggs, which Marcos uses to feed his family and sell, and meat when they reach the appropriate size.
Marcos has taken out loans from our institution before. He has always paid them back punctually. Furthermore, he and his family are well known and respected in the zone. Marcos plans to use this loan to purchase additional animals and replenish his stocks of feed. He is thankful for the opportunity to take out a loan at a lower cost due to its financing through Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase additional animals and feed

loans.name: Celso

texts.en:
Celso is 50 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and children. The family is well known in the region and very well respected. They live in Anexo Sorronto in the district of Oyotún.

Celso raises animals in his backyard. These include ducks, chickens and sheep. He has been raising animals for over ten years and is very well versed in their proper care and management. He is respected in the zone for his high quality animals.

This is his first loan with Edpyme Alternativa. He plans to use his current loan to increase his herd, make a few necessary repairs to his corrals and purchase additional feed. He appreciates the opportunity to access credit quickly in opportune times and is thankful for the reduced interest rate that the Kiva product will provide.

loans.use: To increase his herd, repair his corrals and purchase additional feed

loans.name: Jose Wilfredo

texts.en:
Jose is 22 years old, single and has no children. He lives along with family members in Pedregal Grande in the district of Catacaos to the south of the city of Piura. It is a rural area with a high quantity of arable land in agricultural production. The region is poor and the majority of the homes are constructed of adobe with earthen floors.
Jose's home operates as a center for the sale of a number of different goods. He raises animals for sale and also maintains a small store selling flour, firewood and beer. He has been running the store for three years.
This will be Jose’s first loan with our institution. He doesn’t have any debt outstanding with other institutions. He is requesting a loan in order to purchase additional flour and beer. He finds that the demand for these goods is well above his current supply and he would like to take advantage of the market in order to increase his sales. He hopes that this will further increase his business as his neighbors and friends spread the word about the availability of products at his store.

loans.use: To purchase additional flour and beer

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El señor José Luis M. E. desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda para ampliarla y tener mas espacio. Para poder realizar su proyecto el necesita comprar material y pagar mano de obra. José Luis y su esposa trabajan en maquiladora para poder sostener los gastos de la casa.
texts.en: Mr. Jose Luis M. E. wants to build a bedroom in his home to have a more living space.  In order to complete his project he needs to purchase building material and he needs to hire a contractor. Jose Luis and his wife work in a factory to cover the household expenses.

loans.use: To build a room in their home.

loans.name: Eleazar

texts.es: Eleazar Solís B. desde hace 20 años el inicio su negocio de la venta de ropa usada y nueva que trae desde la ciudad de México DF y Estados unidos para ofrecer a sus clientes calidad y bajo precio. El es un hombre soltero pero apoya a su madre con los gastos. Ahora en este momento Eleazar desea un crédito para comprar más mercancía y así estar preparado para la temporada de frio.
texts.en: Twenty years ago, Eleazar Solís B. began his business selling used and new clothing that he brings from Mexico City and the United States so that he can offer his customers high quality and low prices.  He is unmarried but supports his mother with his earnings.  Currently, Eleazar wants a loan in order to buy more merchandise and, thus, be prepared for the winter season.

loans.use: To invest in the business

loans.name: Amparo Del Rosario

texts.en:
Amparo is 55 years old. She has three children, two of whom are still in elementary school and the other of whom is an adult. She lives with her husband and children in Chosica del Norte, near La Victoria, in the southern outskirts of the city of Chiclayo. It is a zone that is primarily populated by farmers who raise animals and miscellaneous crops.
Amparo has a small general store which she has been running for the last 14 years. She has many long-term customers and friends who frequent her store to purchase items for daily needs and small celebrations. Her husband works as a salesman in a distribution company.
This will be Amparo’s first loan with our institution. She hopes to use the loan in order to make improvements to her home and expand the inventory of her store.

loans.use: To make improvements to her home and expand her store's inventory

loans.name: Constantina

texts.es: La señora Constantina V. M. cuenta con un negocio de la venta de ropa usada desde hace 2 años todos los fines de semana, este es su fuente de ingresos al cual desea invertir en el; para seguir generando mas ganancias. Constantina se intereso en el apoyo que se brinda en esta institución es por eso que quiere un crédito para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
For two years Constantina V. M. has had a business selling used clothes every week-end.  She wishes to invest in this source of her income in order to generate more income.  

Constantina  became interested in the help this institution offers because she wants a loan to stock her business.

loans.use: To stock her business

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 30 years old. She has one son and lives with her parents in La Esperanza, a part of Reque – a town to the south of the city of Chiclayo. It is a rural area in which the majority of the population raise animals in order to support themselves. Estela and her family support each other in order to maintain a clean and happy home.

Estela will use her loan to expand her small general store.  She sells items of basic needs including soap, accessories and food products such as rice, beans and corn. She has been running her business for over six months and finds that she needs access to more capital in order to realize greater discounts on her wholesale purchases. This will allow her to increase her profit margin and better provide for the family.

Estela has good references both from the community and other businesses. She is a hardworking woman who is extremely dedicated to ensuring that her son receive the best opportunities as he grows up. She is grateful for the access to credit that she has been provided and the reduced cost of the Kiva product.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise at greater discounts

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es:
La persona que aparece en la imagen es el esposo.
Karina Elizabeth T. Solís y su esposo cuenta con un negocio de la elaboración de bloques desde hace 8 años, en este momento el negocio esta muy bien las ventas pero no cuentan con el capital para comprar el material para seguir con el proceso de elaboración, para esto solicitan se tercer crédito para surtir su negocio y así generar mas ganancias. Karina ha demostrado tener muy buena cultura de pago.
texts.en:
The person appearing in the photo is the husband.  Karina Elizabeth T. Solís and her husband have had a business making cement blocks for eight years.

The business is doing very well now, but they do not have the money to buy the material to continue the process of making the blocks.  

This is why they are requesting their third loan in order to stock their business and generate more income. 

Karina has demonstrated very good payment history.

loans.use: Invest in the business

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan C. C. is 37 years old. He lives along with his partner and youngest son in a small rural part of Jose Leonard Ortiz, in the northern part of the city of Chiclayo. They have lived there for seven years and are well liked in the region. Juan is known for good work and has good personal references.

For the last two years, Juan has driven a mototaxi in Jose Leonardo Ortiz. He provides regular transport for residents of the zone, taking them to work or school or to purchase supplies.

This will be Juan’s first loan with our institution. He plans to use the loan to make much needed repairs to his mototaxi and to purchase accessories that will allow him to provide better service to his clients. He hopes that the repairs will end the constant bleed of money that he has suffered from the ongoing expenses of maintaining the mototaxi.

loans.use: To repair mototaxi and purchase accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Stock his business

loans.name: Erli Ysacc

texts.en:
Erli Ysacc V. D. is 41 years old. He lives with his partner and two young children in the town of Sandial, which is in the district of Pitipo in the province of Ferreñafe. It is a small rural community outside the cities of Chiclayo and Ferreñafe, which grows a wide range of products including corn, rice and sugar cane.

For more that six years Erli has grown crops in the area. He is very experienced and his level of production earns him a certain respect in the area. He currently has a good crop of hard yellow corn that is in the process of maturing. As of the date of disbursement of funds, the corn had forty days of growth.

Erli needs the loan in order to purchase fertilizers and pesticides that he will use to ensure the best growth of his crop. He hopes to be able to apply urea as a fertilizer and then fumigate the area in order to prevent the entry of bugs and other pests.

Erli has taken loans from our institution in the past. He has good references from both other businesses and friends. He greatly appreciates access to credit in this moment in order to promote the growth of his crops, and he is thankful for the lower cost product that he is able to obtain as a result of the Kiva funding. He is always striving to better the lifestyle of his family and provide for his children. He hopes that this will be one small step further in the right direction.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Jose Nelson

texts.en:
Jose Nelson R. C. is 32 years old. He lives with his wife and their two young children. Their home is located in a small rural zone of Jose Leonardo Ortiz in the northern part of the city of Chiclayo.

Jose runs a small stand in the streets of the Moshoqueque market. He sells peas in small quantities at retail prices to local people who frequent the market. Since the Moshoqueque market is primarily a wholesale market, Jose has good access to a large number of individuals who sell other products in the area and make purchases for their personal needs from him. Jose’s wife currently remains at home caring for the children and maintaining the home.

This will be Jose’s third loan from our institution. All of his payments have been punctual and in full. He has been an excellent client. He is requesting the current loan in order to expand his inventory, given that he is often completely sold out each day and unable to fully meet the demands of his customers. He hopes that this will allow him to increase his income and better provide for his family and children.

loans.use: To expand his inventory of peas

loans.name: Jhony Adalberto

texts.es:
Jhony es un padre de familia de 40 años que reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el sector El Puente del distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque. A más de dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde que hace mas de diez años. El cuenta con un pequeño terreno agrícola en donde suele sembrar limón. Como es la fuente de ingresos más importante con la que cuenta el siempre trata de dar lo mejor de si para obtener siempre buenas cosechas.

Precisamente para lograr este objetivo ha creído conveniente adquirir algunos abonos con los cuales desea brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Jhony es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable, su mayor anhelo es poder brindarle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar alguna carrera superior. En la imagen aparece junto a uno de ellos.
texts.en:
Jhony, age 40, lives with his wife and children in the El Puente sector of the Olmos district.  It is an agricultural area in the Lambayeque province, and it is two and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo.

He has been doing agricultural work for over ten years.  He has a small piece of land where he grows lemons.  As this is his most important source of income, he always tries to give the best of himself in order to always have good harvests.

That is exactly why he believes it is advisable to get some fertilizers to achieve this objective.  He will use the fertilizers for crop maintenance.  To do so he has seen the necessity of requesting a loan, for the first time, from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 soles.

Jhony is a very level-headed and responsible person.  His greatest desire is to be able to give his children the opportunity to study and have a better career.

He appears in the photo with one of his children.

loans.use: Repair and maintenance expenses for his lemon crops

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José Carlos es un padre de familia de 32 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos menores de edad en el sector Carlos Stein, una zona urbano marginal del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz, uno de los distritos más poblados de la región y a la vez uno de los que tienen mayores indices de pobreza.

Se dedida desde hace cinco años a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado que está conformado por una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina), el brinda su servicio en la zona y gracias a el se encarga de sustentar los gastos de su familia. Paralelamente trabaja también como maestro albañil.

José Carlos ha venido ahorrando dinero para adquirir una mototaxi más, la cual piensa alquilar para agenciarse de ingresos adicionales. Para completar la cantidad de dinero que necesita ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

José Carlos ya ha trabajado anteriormente con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es poder adquirir una casa para vivir junto a su esposa e hijo ya que actualmente vive en la casa de su suegra.
texts.en:
Jose Carlos is a family man. He is 32 years old and he lives together with his wife and their two young children in the Carlos Stein sector. It is a suburban region in of the Jose Leonardo Ortiz district, one of the most populous districts in the region and it is also one of the poorest regions. 

For the past five years he has been providing transportation services to both passengers and cargo using a motorcycle rickshaw (it is a motorized vehicle that is made of a transformed motorcycle with an attached cabin). He provides service in the region and thanks to this business he is able to cover his family's expenses. Additionally he also works as a construction worker. 

Jose Carlos has been saving money to purchase another motorcycle taxi. He's thinking of renting out this second unit to have an additional source of income. In order to complete the funds he needs he has approached Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles. 

Jose Carlos has been involved with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and he has been a good and responsible client. His greatest dream is to have a home of his own where he could live together with his wife and their son. Currently they live with his mother-in-law.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorcycle rickshaw.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es una madre de familia de 42 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el sector Yencala Boggiano, una zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, ubicado a más de media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de ganado ovino. Ella cría ovejas en un corral situado cerca a su domicilio. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde vive. Con el dinero que percibe de este negocio ella ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Isabel desea incursionar en el negocio de la crianza y venta de ganado caprino, ya que estos animales desarrollan más rápido y son vendidos a mejor precio. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer bastante tranquila y trabajadora. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer honesta y de confianza.
texts.en:
Isabel is a mom, she is 42 years old and she lives together with her husband and their children in the Yencala Boggiano sector. It is a rural district of Lambayeque, located more than an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo. 

She raises sheep for a living. She keeps the sheep in a corral near her home. When they have reached a certain time in their development she sells them to the merchants that visit the region. With the profits she earns from this business she is able to contribute with her husband towards the family's finances.

Isabel wants to start raising and selling goats because they grow and develop quicker and they are sold at better prices. In order to meet her objective she has approached Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) for a first time loan in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles.

She is a calm and hard working woman. Those that know her consider her to be a very honest and trustworthy person.

loans.use: To purchase goats.

loans.name: María Olga

texts.es:
María Olga es una madre de familia de 48 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el distrito agrícola de Chepén, una zona de regular movimiento comercial que es la capital de la provincia del mismo nombre y que se encuentra situada en la región La Libertad, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su domicilio. El negocio le sirve para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de los gastos familiares. Adicionalmente cría animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio con la finalidad de venderlos a los negociantes que con frecuencia visitan la zona en donde vive.

María desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más artículos para su bodega, de este modo ella espera aumentar sus ventas y percibir un mayor número de ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles con los cuales espera lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer emprendedora y que siempre se esfuerza para sacar adelante a su familia. Sus clientes y vecinos la consideran una mujer de trato amable y servicial.
texts.en:
Maria Olga is a mom, she is 48 years old and she lives together with her husband and their two children in the agricultural district of Chepen, a commercial region from the capital city in the province of the same name. It is located in La Libertad, more than one hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

She has a general store from where she sells every day items and groceries. The store is located in a section of her home. With this business she is able to contribute with her husband towards the family's expenses. She also raises small farm animals behind their home until they are eventually sold to the merchants that visit the region where they live. 

Maria wishes to expand her business and to purchase more inventory for her store. She will be able to increase her sales and see an improvement in her profits. To this end she has requested a first time loan of Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1200 nuevos soles.  With the help of this loan she will reach her goal. 

She is an enterprising woman and she has always found the strength to provide for her family.  Her clients and her neighbors know her to be a very kind and helpful person.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for her business.

loans.name: Ananías

texts.es:
Ananias tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres en el anexo Nueva Esperanza, una comunidad pequeña de la zona rural del distrito agrícola de Cayalti, situado a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales desde hace más de 2 años el cría aves de corral y animales menores en un ambiente localizado en su domicilio, cuando estos han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona frecuentemente. Además trabaja como vigilante. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad le sirven para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a sus padres con el sostenimiento de su familia.

Ananias desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y alimento balanceado, de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un prestamo de 1500 nuevos soles.

Ananias es un joven bastante trabajador y responsable. En la zona donde vive sus vecinos y conocidos le consideran alguien honrado y de confianza.
texts.en:
Ananias is 21 years old, he is single and he lives with his parents in the community of Nueva Esperanza. It is a small community in the rural agricultural region of Cayatli. It is located more than one hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

He has been raising livestock for the past 2 years. He raises poultry and other small animals in a section of the property. When the livestock have reached a certain level in their development he sells them to the merchants that visit the region. He also works as a security guard. The income that he earns from this business is enough to cover his personal expenses and he is able to contribute to his parents' support.

Ananias wishes to expand his business with the purchase of more livestock and balanced feed.  He will see an improvement in his sales and in his earnings. To this end he has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles. 

Ananias is a young and hard working man who is very responsible. His neighbors and his friends know him as an honest and trustworthy person.

loans.use: To purchase livestock and feed.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Felix es un padre de familia de 42 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a su hijo en el caserío La Laja del distrito de La Florida, una zonza rural perteneciente a la provincia de San Miguel y que se encuentra ubicado en la región Cajamarca, a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace mas de 10 años a la comercialización de café y guayaquil (principales productos producidos en su localidad), el adquiere los productos a los vecinos de la zona y se encarga de transportarlo desde La Florida hasta Chiclayo, en donde vende su mercadería. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad se encarga de sustentar la economía de su familia.

Felix desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más mercadería para ampliar sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles  con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

Felix es un hombre bastante trabajador y entregado a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es ver a su familia progresar y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Felix is a father, he is 42 years old and he lives together with his wife and their son in the community of La Laja in the district of La Florida. It is a rural region in the province of San Miguel, located in the region of Cajamarca. It is more than three hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital city of Lambayeque. 

For the past 10 years he has been a coffee merchant in Guayaquil (the most common product produced in the region). He acquires the products from his neighbors in the region and he transports it from La Florida all the way to Chiclayo where he sells it. With the earnings he is able to provide for his family. 

Felix wishes to expand his business with the purchase of more products in order to increase his sales. To this end he has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. 

Felix is a hardworking person who is devoted to his family. His greatest dream is to see his family comfortable.

loans.use: To purchase coffee for resale.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 61 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa en el caserio Pomape del distrito de Mosnsefú, una zona agrícola situada a media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde que era muy joven a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura. Por un lado se dedica a criar vacas, de las cuales extrae su leche para comercializarla y adicionalmente se dedica a la siembra de forraje, el cual es utilizado para alimentar a sus animales. Con los ingresos que obtiene de estas actividades el se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia.

José desea invertir en la alimentación de su ganado de modo que su producción aumente y pueda percibir mayores ingresos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado y en el mantenimiento de su cultivo de alfalfa.

José es uun hombre que gusta mucho de su trabajo. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien honrado y confiable. Anteriormente ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual y responsable.
texts.en:
Jose is a father, he is 61 years old and he lives together with his wife in the community of Pomape, in the district of Monsefu. It is an agricultural region located half an hour from the city of Chiclayo. 

Ever since he was a young man he has always worked in agriculture. He raises cattle and sells the milk they produce and he also keeps foraging plantations that he uses to feed the animals.  With the income he earns from these businesses he is able to provide for his family. 

Jose wishes to invest in the purchase of feed for his livestock to increase production in milk and improve his earnings. To this end he has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles. He will purchase balanced feed and he will maintain his alfalfa cultivation. 

Jose is someone who loves his work. Those that know him consider him to be honest and trustworthy. Previously he has had loans with Edpyme Alternativa and he has been a good and responsible client.

loans.use: To maintain his alfalfa plantation.

loans.name: Galán Fiestas

texts.es:
M. tiene 27 años, es casada y vive junto a su familia en el distrito D. San José, una zona pesquera que pertenece a L. provincia D. Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica desD. hace tres años a L. venta D. productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en su domicilio. ElL. ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos D. uso diario y debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando en el área ya cuenta con una clienteL. fija. Adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicio D. costura. Con estos ingresos elL. ayuda a su esposo, que es pescador, con el sostenimiento D. los gastos familiares.

M. desea ampliar su bodega con L. compra D. mas mercadería, D. modo que su nivel D. ventas e ingresos aumente. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1200 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

M. es una mujer bastante entregada a su familia y que se esfuerza a diario para darles lo mejor. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer tranquiL. y honrada.
texts.en:
M. is 27 years old, she is married and she lives together with her family in the district of San Jose. It is a region that relies primarily on fishing in the province of Lambayeque. It is about twenty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo. 

For the past three years she has been selling every day products and groceries from a store located in a section of her home. She sells a variety of products of daily use and given her time in the business she has earned a solid client base. She also provides tailoring services. With the help of these businesses she is able to contribute with her husband, a fisherman, towards the family's expenses. 

M. wishes to expand her grocery store with the purchase of more merchandise. She will improve her sales and see better revenues with this investment. She has requested a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1200 nuevos soles. 

M. is very devoted to her family and she works hard every day to proviD. them with the best. Those that know her consider her to be a calm and honest person.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for her store.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a forty-year-old married man with three children, living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His family dream is to have a better standard of living in future. He owns a retail shop, restaurant, tea plantation, and for the last ten years, he has seen them grow fairly well, but this has not stopped him from hoping for better results in his businesses than they are now. The purpose of the loan is to buy fertilizers for his tea plantation so as to realize increased production.

loans.use: Buying fertilizers for his tea plantation

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is a fifty-two-year-old man, married to peasant farmer with five children ranging from four to twenty-two years old, all living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He lives in his own permanent house with his family and his family dream is to educate his children and increase his household income. Stephen has been operating a carpentry business for the last twenty years though he is facing a challenge of delayed payments from customers, but this has not stopped him from hoping to progress further in future. He needs the loan to purchase hand saws for his carpentry workshop.

loans.use: Buying hand saws for his carpentry workshop

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a twenty-two-year-old married farmer with no children but with one dependent, living in Fort Portal Uganda. He owns a house and his family dream is to have a good family and a God-fearing one. He has been operating his farming business for the last fifteen years, since childhood, but facing a challenge of low prices and thieves who feed on his produce. This still encourages him that he will have a better farming business in future. He now wants to try all commercial methods of farming so as to realize increased and better production on his farmland. The purpose of the loan is to buy fertilizers, modern seeds for planting for the new season, and pay labor for clearing his farmland.

loans.use: Buying fertilizers, modern seeds for planting for the new season, and paying labor for clearing his farmland

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en: Augustine is a fifty-four-year-old married man with seven children, ranging from seven to twenty-eight years of age. He owns a house which he lives in with his family in Fort Portal, Uganda and his family dream is to have a better standard of living. He is an agriculturalist and he has been operating his business, farming for the last twenty-eight years just like most families in the rural areas where children become engaged in farming at an early age. He faces a challenge of thieves and animals that destroy his produce or crops. The purpose of the loan is to pay labor for clearing his farmland and also buying better seeds for planting.

loans.use: Paying labor for clearing his farmland and also buying better seeds for planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Paying the final installment on his car for transport business

loans.name: Fred

texts.en: Fred is a twenty-five-year-old single man living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He works at one of the local hospitals in Fort Portal, Uganda. Just like many people in Uganda who are in the work force, he is charged back home with taking care of the siblings in case the parents cannot afford to, and that’s where Fred finds himself with the responsibility of educating his younger sister. He however says it’s not easy to make the fees payments of a student at university thus need for a loan. He intends to use the loan funds to pay school fees for his younger sister who is at university.

loans.use: Paying school fees for his sister at university

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase parts for the car

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more items, like sugar

loans.name: Wilber

texts.en:
K. Wilber is 27 years old and lives in the town of Ntungamo in the Mbarara region of Uganda. He is married and has one child. His child is not currently in school. Wilber's business is a jewelry shop, which he has had for five years.         

To help expand his business, Wilber has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more jewelry. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Wilber hopes to generate greater profits and take care of his family. In the future, Wilber hopes to expand his business more.

loans.use: To purchase more jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more items like sugar

loans.name: Asinath

texts.en:
N. Asinath is 29 years old and lives in the town of Kabwohe in the Mbarara region of Uganda.  She is married and has 2 children.  Both of her children are currently in school.  Asinath has a business of a retail shop, which she has had for 6 years.         

To help expand her business, Asinath has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase sugar and soap.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Asinath hopes to generate greater profits and take care of herself.  In the future, Asinath hopes to expand her business further.

loans.use: sugar and soap

loans.name: Nassulu

texts.en:
M. Nassulu is 29 years old and lives in the town of Kabwohe in the Mbarara region of Uganda.  He is married and has one child, who is not currently in school.  Nassulu has a business of a retail shop, which he has had for 9 years.         

To help expand his business, Nassulu has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase more items like soap and sugar.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Nassulu hopes to generate greater profits and take care of his family.  In the future, Nassulu hopes to add more to his business by buying more inventory like soap and sugar.

loans.use: expanding store inventory

loans.name: Munuku

texts.en:
R. Munuku is 34 years old and lives in the town of Mbarara in the Mbarara region of Uganda. He is married and has four children. All of his children are currently in school. Munuku has been a butcher for five years.         

To help expand his business, Munuku has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more meat.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Munuku hopes to generate greater profits and pay his children's school fees.  In the future, Munuku hopes to expand more on his business.

loans.use: To buy meat

loans.name: Roida

texts.en:
K. Roida is 38 years old and lives in the town of Mbarara in the Mbarara region of Uganda. She is widowed and has four children. All of her children are currently in school. Roida has been selling clothes for four years.  She also owns a clinic. 

To help expand her business, Roida has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to start a new business. With the help of the loan from BRAC, Roida hopes to generate greater profits and pay for her children's school fees.  In the future, Roida hopes to expand more on her businesses and become a successful business woman.

loans.use: To start a new business

loans.name: Katia Judith

texts.es: La señorita Katia es soltera no tiene hijitos, vive en la casa de su Mama, es independiente. Cuenta con un capital de trabajo propio, su actividad económica es el servicio de fletes de trajes típicos y otros, ella también borda los trajes y los confecciona se encuentra instalado en una tienda  que esta en alquiler. Tiene bastantes clientes en especial tiene contactos con los colegios quienes usan estos trajes en las distintas actividades festivas. El crédito que solicita es para aumento de capital para poder surtir más su negocio, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Katia is single and she has no children. She lives with her mom, although she is independent.  She has her own source of income. She makes traditional clothing and other garments. She also embroiders clothing in a shop she has rented. She has a good client base, especially because she has contracts with the schools that use uniforms and outfits for various festivities. The loan will be used as working capital to purchase inventory for her business. She is very grateful with the organization for the support provided.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics to make uniforms.

loans.name: Yalila

texts.es: La Sra. Yalila es casada tiene tres hijos los cuales los dos mayores le ayudan en el negocio también el esposo, tiene un bar pensión donde prepara una variedad de platos como caldos, pique macho, charque, laping y otros. Cuenta con muebles y vajilla propia. La solicitante anteriormente vivía en la Localidad de Saipina cerca a Santa Cruz, por motivos  económicos se vinieron a vivir a Cochabamba por lo que están comprando un terreno para poder construir su casita posteriormente, actualmente viven en anticrético donde tienen instalado el negocio, el dinero del  crédito es para poder pagar ese terreno, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Yalila is married and she has three children, two of whom are grown and help her with the business. Her husband also helps with the business. They have a restaurant bar where they server a variety of meals, including soups and other traditional foods. The business is equipped with furniture and dishes that are her own. She previously lived in the district of Saipina near Santa Cruz. For financial reason they came to live to Cochabamba. They have purchased a plot of land to build a house later on. Currently they live in a section of the building where the business is located. The funds from this loan will be used to pay for the plot of land. She is a very hard working person and she is very grateful for the support provided.

loans.use: To purchase a plot of land.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La Señora Margarita vive en casa propia quien tiene un puestito en la escuelita cerca D. su domicilio ella vive con su esposo y su hija que le ayudan con los gastos familiares, la señora comenzó desD. muy joven con este negocio D. la venta D. dulces, nos pidió el crédito para poder comprarse una pequeña casetita y así estar mas cómoda y no sufrir del viento y la lluvia ya que pasa muchas cosas cuando venD., es muy trabajadora desea también surtir su puesto D. venta, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado	.
texts.en: Margarita lives in her own home and she has a stand in the nearby school. She lives with her husband and their daughter and they all contribute towards the family's expenses. She started out when she was very young selling candies. She requested a loan to purchase a stall so that she will not have to suffer from the winds and the rain. She is very hard working and she wants to increase the variety for sale. She is very grateful for the support provided.

loans.use: To purchase a stall.

loans.name: Ruddy

texts.es: El Señor Ruddy  es soltero vive  solo  en un anticrético que lo a adquirido con su trabajo, es una persona responsable, trabajadora. El cliente solicita el crédito para compra herramientas para la actividad de mecánica, tiene bastante experiencia en el rubro su especialidad es arreglo de camiones grandes, comenzó trabajando de ayudante de mecánica y ahora ya tiene su propio taller , el se siente muy orgulloso ya que para el es un logro muy grande tener su propio taller y así poder ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, esta muy agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Ruddy is single and he lives alone in a living space that he acquired through his work. He is a very responsible person and he is very hard working. He requests a loan to purchase tools to use in his business as a mechanic. He has significant experience in this field of work. He specializes in heavy machinery. He started out working as an assistant but now he has his own shop. He is very proud because getting his own shop and be able to help support his parents is a great achievement. He is very grateful to the organization for their support.

loans.use: To purchase tools.

loans.name: Susana Marcelina Fernanda

texts.es: La señora Susana Marcelina L. Aragón cuenta con negocio de abarrotes desde hace 6 años donde vende botanas, refrescos, leche, tortillas y mas. Ella comenta que hace un año por cuestiones de salud la operaron de su brazos y se le coloco platino lo cual no puede trabajar en alguna empresa maquiladora u oficina. Ella requiere de un préstamo para surtir su negocio ya que es de la manera que puede apoyar a su esposo con los gastos.
texts.en: Susan Marcelina L. A. has had her grocery store for the past 6 years. She sells foods, drinks, milk, tortillas and more. She says that about a year ago she had surgery in her arms and she had plates put in and it prevented her from working elsewhere in a factory or office. She requires a loan to purchase inventory for her business and to be able to contribute with her husband towards their expenses.

loans.use: To purchase inventory.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: Verónica C. L. una mujer emprendedora desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada en una de las pulgas muy conocidas de la ciudad; lugar donde mucha gente recurre. La señora ya tiene cliente los cuales la van recomendado por su carácter tan amable al atender y la calidad que ofrece de su producto. La señora Trinidad desea comprar más mercancía para su negocio para tener más variedad y así tener ingresos mayores.
texts.en: Veronica C. L. is a hardworking woman who has made a living for the past three years selling used clothes in one of the best known flea markets in the city. She already has customers who recommend her for her pleasant demeanor as well as the quality of her goods. She wants to buy more merchandise so she can have a greater variety and so greater income.

loans.use: Stock her business

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es: Serapio G. se dedica al polarizado de vidrios de automóviles desde hace 12 años, estos trabajos los realiza  a las fueras de un centro comercial muy conocido en la ciudad allí es donde el polariza carros, camionetas, camiones aun bajo precio, comenta Serapio que en la temporada de Diciembre es mas requerido este trabajo, es por ello que requiere de un préstamo para comprar el materia y asi seguir trabajando y dar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en: Serapio G. has made  a living tinting car windows for the past 12 years. He does low cost work on cars, vans and trucks outside a well known shopping center. Serapio says that December is the busiest time and so he needs a loan to buy materials to keep working and feeding his family.

loans.use: Buy materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase fabric for skirts and ingredients

loans.name: Ximena

texts.es: La Señora Ximena vive en casa en alquiler, ella  vive con sus hijitos, la señora quedo muy joven viuda, cuenta la Sra. Que fue un golpe para ella, pero pudo recuperarse de la ausencia de su esposo   ahora ella tiene que sacar sola a sus hijitos adelante ella se dedica a vender zapatos y cosméticos por catalogo y es precisamente que desea el crédito para comprar cosméticos por catalogo que se encuentra en promoción y así poder tener un poco mas de ganancia  le esta yendo muy bien con su negocio tiene bastantes pedidos,  se fue feliz y agradeciendo a la institución por darle esta oportunidad.
texts.en:
Ximena rents her house.  She lives with her two little children.  She was widowed at a very young age.  She tells us that this was a heavy blow to her but she has been able to recover from her husband’s absence and now she must raise her children alone.  

She sells catalogue shoes and cosmetics and this is precisely what she needs the loan for: to buy catalogue cosmetics that are currently on sale so that she can earn a bit more profit.

She is doing well with the business and she has quite a few placed orders.  She left happy and grateful with the institution for giving her this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics in quantity.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es: El Sr. Samuel  nacido en Santa Cruz soltero agricultor de 24 años hijo del  Isaac por falta de recursos económicos el dejo de estudiar ya que no contaba tampoco con el apoyo de sus Padres y se dedico a la agricultura el trabaja juntamente con su hermano el señor Limber, ellos siembran maíz, maní y yuca y también se dedican a sacar madera para leñas carpintería, y hacen carbón en tiempo que no se puede sembrar pero mas se dedican a la agricultura, el dinero del crédito lo utilizaran en la compra de semillas para la siembra de sus productos, después lo comercializan en el mercado de la localidad de el Torno.  Ellos viven a 10 Km de Santa. Rita hacia el naciente, ellos viven y tienen su casa en su propia parcela.
texts.en:
Samuel, 24, is a single farmer who was born in Santa Cruz; he is Isaac’s son.  

For lack of economic resources he had to drop out of school because he didn’t have support from his parents.  He decided to go into farming and he works alongside his brother, Limber.  They plant corn, peanuts and manioc.  They also extract lumber to be used in carpentry and they make charcoal during seasons that planting is impossible.  But their main focus is on agriculture.

The money from the loan will be used to buy seed for their crops.  The crops are then sold in El Torno’s market.  They live 10 kilometers east of Santa Rita.  They own and live in their house on their own piece of property.

loans.use: For slash and burn field preparation and to plant corn.

loans.name: Amistad Por Siempre Group

texts.es:
El banco D. Emprendimiento "AMISTAD POR SIEMPRE  " es un grupo  que se encuentra en su 6º   ciclo   , el cual demostraron ser  personas responsables, puntuales  y trabajadoras, este grupo esta representada por las siguientes socias: como Presidenta esta la Sra. Rosa  quien es la líder y fundadora del grupo, tiene el negocio D. venta D. sandalias en el Mercado los días Miércoles y Sábados,   es casada  y tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya están casados, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería en sandalias y así poder incrementar su capital D. trabajo. Como Secretaria esta la Srta. Karina quien  es soltera  y no tiene  hijos  y su negocio es la venta D. desayunos en el mercado solo por las mañanas, el dinero del crédito lo utilizaran en la compra D. una cocina,  y la Tesorera  es la Sra. Juana   quien es viuda   y   tiene 2  hijos pero independientes, tiene su negocio un local donD. venD. comida todos los días y es una persona muy responsable y querida por su grupo, el dinero del crédito lo utilizar en la compra D. abarrotes al por mayor.
Todas las socias son personas responsables y trabajadoras, están muy  agradecidas con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The "AMISTAD POR SIEMPRE“ (Friendship Forever) communal bank is in its 6th cycle.  They showed themselves to be responsible, punctual and hard working.  

The group is represented by the following:  

Rosa, President, is the leader and founder of the group.  She sells sandals in the market on Wednesdays and Saturdays.  She’s married and has two married children.  She will use the loan money to buy sandals in order to increase her working capital.

Karina, Secretary, is single and doesn’t have children.  She sells breakfasts in the market in the morning.  She will use the funds to buy a stove.

Juana, Treasurer, is a widow with two independent children.  She has a stall where she sells food every day.  She’s a very responsible, well liked member of the group.  She will use the funds to buy groceries at wholesale.

All the members are responsible and hard working.  They are very grateful to the institution for the support given.

loans.use: To buy sandals.

loans.name: Nery

texts.es: El señor Nery  agricultor tiene 2 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, pero cuando no van a la escuela ayudan en la siembra y cosecha de sus productos,  vive con doña Yandy, el Sr. Nery Nacido en Valle Grande y su esposa  es nacida en San Luis se dedican a la agricultura y tiene 20 vacas las ordeña y la leche y el queso lo saca al mercado y todo lo que producen lo venden en el mismo lugar.  Este es el tercer crédito que trabaja con Emprender, no hubo problemas en el pago de sus cuotas, es un apersona muy trabajadora, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de semillas y también en los gastos que ocasiona el preparado de la tierra para la siembra, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo de brindado.
texts.en:
Nery is a farmer.  He has two school age children.  When they are out of school they help him with planting and harvesting.  He lives with Yandy.  Nery was born in villa Grande and his wife was born in San Luis.  They are farmers.  He also has 20 cows that he milks.  The milk and cheese is taken to market and everything they produce is sold in the same place.

This is his third loan with Emprender.  There were no problems with his repayments.  He is a very hard working person.

He will use the loan funds to buy seed and also to pay costs associated with preparing the fields for planting.

He is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: For slash and burn field clearing and corn planting.

loans.name: Jorge Manuel

texts.es:
Jorge Manuel O. P. tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero, no tiene hijos, y reside en la Comunidad de Agua Blanca en Catacamas, Olancho. 

Actualmente es agricultor, aprendió a cultivar sin ningún conocimiento previo y pero cuando tenía alguna duda de lo que estaba haciendo le preguntaba a personas con experiencia. Inició trabajando él solo con el cultivo de tomate y repollo, ahora siembra chile y tiene un empleado, su jornada laboral comienza a las 6:00 am y termina a las 5:00 pm. La ventaja es que al cuidar bien el cultivo el producto que resulta es atractivo para los clientes y entonces se vende rápido. Su mayor dificultad es el control de las plagas y no tener un sistema de riego en buenas condiciones. 

El préstamo solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de insumos y materiales para instalar un sistema de riego artesanal, y para pagar la mano de obra. Con el apoyo del préstamo podrá seguir apoyando a sus padres con los gastos familiares y también espera llegar a cumplir su meta que es tener un sistema de riego elaborado por un profesional para poder cultivar en todas las épocas de año, especialmente en el verano.
texts.en:
Jorge Manuel O. P., 22, is single and has no children; he lives in the Agua Blanca community in Catacamas, Olancho.

He is a farmer.  He learned to farm on his own and when he had a question he’d ask people with experience.  He started working alone growing tomatoes and cabbage.  Now he grows chilies and he has an employee.  His work day starts at 6am and ends at 5pm.  The advantage is that when crops are well cared for the resulting product is attractive to customers and sells quickly.  His greatest difficulty is pest control and he does not have an irrigation system in working order.

The requested funds will be used to buy materials and supplies to install an artisanal watering system and to pay labor costs.  With support from the loan he will be able to continue to help his parents meet household expenses and also reach his goal of having a professionally designed irrigation system so that he can farm year-round, especially in summer.

loans.use: To buy materials for an artisanal watering system and farming supplies.

loans.name: Francisca Geneveva

texts.en:
Franscisca is 58 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in the neighborhood of the Las Brisas in the city of Chiclayo. The family has lived in the area for over 25 years. They own their own home.

Out of the front of her home, Franscisca operates a small general store. She has run the store for approximately six years. She has a good presence in the community and a number of loyal clients. She also has the assistance of her children since they are getting older, which allows her to get additional rest and to keep the store open for additional hours.

Franscisca has requested a loan of 1,000 PEN to purchase additional merchandise and expand the selection she offers to her clients. In this manner, she hopes to gain additional clients and increase her income. She also hopes to be able to use the opportunity to proviD. her children with a good business lesson.

loans.use: Purchase additional merchandise and expand the selection she offers to her clients

loans.name: Raul

texts.en:
Raul is sixty-four years old. He lives along with his wife in their own home in Jose Leonard Ortiz in the northern part of the city of Chiclayo. His children are already adults and live outside of the home.

Raul drives a taxi in and around the city of Chiclayo. He also receives a pension from his previous service within the federal police force. The brand of his taxi is typical for the area. It is a very resilient vehicle which gets good gas mileage.

Unfortunately, the year 2001 vehicle is beginning to show some wear. It is in need of a few repairs in order to keep keep Raul on the road. For this reason he has requested a loan of S/. 2,000.00.  Raul hopes to be able to continue working as a taxi driver in order to provide a better life for himself and his wife as they continue to age.

loans.use: Make repairs to his taxi

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
Martina tiene 47 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos, vive junto a su familia en el anexo La Curva, una comunidad pequeña situada en la zona rural del distrito agrícola de Cayalti, lugar ubicado a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros) ella alquila su vehículo a un chofer particular para que brinde el servicio de transporte publico en el Cayalti y en sus anexos. Esta actividad le viene proveyendo de ingresos desde hace mas de 3 años.

Martina desea brindar mantenimiento y algunas reparaciones a su unidad movil ya que esta ha empezado a sufrir algunas fallas producto del excesivo uso y del mal estado de las carreteras de la zona. Por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Martina es una mujer entregada a su familia y que se vale de esta actividad para ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento económico de su familia. Su mayor anhelo es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Martina, 47, is married and has two children.  She lives with her family in La Curva Annex, a small community located in a rural area of Cayalti, a farming district, located over an hour away from the city of Chiclayo.

She owns a mototaxi (motorized vehicle consisting of a motorcycle with a cabin attached to provide passenger and cargo transport).  She leases her vehicle to a driver who provides public transportation services in Cayalti and surrounding areas.  This activity has been generating income for over three years.

Martina wants to provide some needed maintenance and repair to her vehicle because it’s starting to show some mechanical problems due to excessive use and the poor state of roads in the area.  She is, therefore, asking for her first, 1000 new sol, loan from Edpyme Alternativa.

Martina is a woman who is dedicated to her family and who relies on this activity to help her husband support the family.  Her greatest wish is to be able to improve her quality of life and to succeed in life.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Marcos Aurelio

texts.es:
Marcos tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos,vive junto a su madre en la zona urbana del distrito de Nueva  Arica, una comunidad dedicada principalmente a la agricultura y que se encuentra ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace mas de 5 años, el cría animales en un ambiente situado en su domicilio, cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde vive y en una feria que toma lugar en el distrito de Cayaltí una vez por semana. 

Marcos desea adquirir algunas calaminas (láminas de metal utilizadas para techar viviendas, son utilizadas por personas de bajos recursos debido a su bajo precio) con las cuales piensa realizar algunas mejoras en la vivienda de sus padres y asi poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

El es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alquien honrado y de confianza.
texts.en:
Marcos is 27 years old, single, and has no children.  He lives with his mother in the urban zone in the district of Nueva Arica, a community mostly dedicated to agriculture, which is locoated more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

He works raising and selling small animals for more than five years.  He raises the animals in a room located in his home.  When they have reached a good level of development, he offers them for sale to merchants who visit the area where he lives, and at a market that happens in the Cayaltí district once a week.

Marcos would like to get some calaminas (pieces of metal used as roofs of houses, used by people of limited means because of their low price).  He would like to make some improvements to his parent's house and improve their quality of life.  To do this, he has asked for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternative for the first time.

He is a quiet and responsible person.  The people that know him consider him honest and trustworthy.

loans.use: Purchase corrugated iron to improve the roof of his house

loans.name: Segundo Felix

texts.es:
Segundo es un padre de familia de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y a sus hijos. Su lugar de residencia queda ubicado en el distrito agrícola de Cayaltí, una zona ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores. El los cría en algunos ambientes de su domicilio alimentándolos de granos y pastos naturales. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. El cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y utiliza los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad como una fuente importante de ingresos para sostener la economía de su familia.

Segundo se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa invertir en la compra de más animales y alimento balanceado para aumentar su nivel de ventas y percibir un mayor número de ganancias. El ya ha tenido préstamos con Edpyme Alternativa anteriormente y ha demostrado ser un cliente puntual y responsable al momento de asumir sus pagos. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona tranquila y de confianza.
texts.en:
Segundo, 58, is a father living in his own house with his wife and children.  His residence is in Cayaltí, an agricultural district located over an hour away from the city of Chiclayo.

He raises small farm animals for sale.  He raises them in an area of his residence feeding them grain and natural grasses.  When they reach a good level of development he sells them to merchants who frequent the area.  He has ten years experience in this business and he uses income from it as an important source of family support.

Segundo is requesting a 1000 new sol loan that he plans to invest in more animals and nutritionally balanced feed for them in order to increase sales and profits.

He has had previous loans with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown himself to be a punctual and responsible client with regard to repayments.  People who know him consider him to be levelheaded and trustworthy.

loans.use: To buy more animals and nutritionally balanced feed for them to increase sales.

loans.name: Hildebrando

texts.es:
Hildebrando es un padre de familia de 59 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en el distrito agrícola de Cayaltí, una zona ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a la crianza y venta de animales menores. El los cría en algunos ambientes de su domicilio alimentándolos de granos y pastos naturales. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. El  utiliza los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad como una fuente importante de ingresos para sostener la economía de su familia.

Hildebrando desea comprar más animales y alimento balanceado para aumentar su nivel de ventas y percibir un mayor número de ganancias por ello se encuentra solicitando por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles. 

Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una persona tranquila y de confianza.
texts.en:
