Esther works at the Humberto School, and has a store where she works with her husband and sells ice cream.  She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise so she can expand her business.

The support of this loan will help her financially, so that she can replace items she needs.  Her dream is to have her own store location and to buy a house.  

She enjoys going for walks with her family.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to expand the business.

loans.name: Olga Margarita

texts.es:
Olga Margarita  M. P.  tiene 28 anos. En Unión Libre vive con el compañero y un hijo, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijo.
  
 Olga es una socia de la ventanilla rural La Esperanza, que está ubicada a 25 kilometres del Cantón de Ventanas. Es una comunidad que se dedica al comercio en mayoría este grupo se reúne cada mes en el sector del barrio San Vicente.

Olga trabaja en el comercio de venta de ropa, sabanas toallas por pedidos, realiza las comprar en Guayaquil en las vende en un local de su casa.

Olga el crédito para la compra de mercadería para ampliar su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es ponerse un  local, arreglar la casa y pagar todas las deudas.

En su tiempo libre le gusta hacer ejercicio.
texts.en:
Olga Margarita M. P. is 28 years old.  She lives in a common-law marriage with her partner and son, and lives in the town of Ventanas located in the Los Ríos province.

Olga is a member of the La Esperanza (“Hope”) cooperative, which is located 25 minutes from Ventanas.  This is a community that dedicates itself to wholesale commerce; they meet every month in the San Vicente neighborhood.

Olga works selling clothing, sheets and towels on order, purchasing her products in Guayaquil and selling them from a location in her house.

Olga needs the loan to buy merchandise to expand her business.  The support from the loan will help her financially, so she can supply her business needs.  Her dreams are to open her own store location, to make repairs to her home, and to pay off all her debt.

In her free time, she likes to exercise.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to expand her business.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is 35 years old, married and a father of three.  For ten years, he has been selling herbal medicines to earn a living.  He has managed to improve his business with the loans from Faulu Kenya hence improving his living standards.  He hopes to expand his business and venture into another business in the future.  He has requested for 20, 000 Kes to buy herbal medicines.

loans.use: To buy herbal medicines

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El señor Victor vive en casa propia en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz; está separado de la esposa. La actividad que realiza es la fabricación de muebles en un taller de carpintería que tiene instalado en su domicilio; con esta actividad, Victor cubre sus necesidades de subsistencia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar venesta (es una madera muy delgada) y terminar algunos muebles que le pidieron.

Es cliente de Impro desde el año 2009 y tiene un  historial de pagos  muy bueno, por lo tanto puede acceder a un nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Victor lives in a house he owns in the Tembladerani zone of the city of La Paz; he is separated from his wife.  His activity is manufacturing furniture in a carpentry workshop that he has installed in his home.  Victor supports himself with this enterprise.

The loan he requests is to buy venesta (a very thin wood) and to finish some furniture that has been ordered.  

He has been a client of Impro since 2009, and he has a good payment history that allows him to access new credit.

loans.use: To purchase venesta, a very thin wood, to finish some pending jobs for his carpentry business.

loans.name: Mariela Colombia

texts.es:
Mariela Colombia  A. G. tiene 31 anos. Es casada vive con el compañero y un hijo, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijo. 
 
 Mariela es una socia de la ventanilla rural La Esperanza, que está ubicada a 25 kilometres del Cantón de Ventanas. Es una comunidad que se dedica al comercio en mayoría este grupo se reúne cada mes en el sector del barrio San Vicente.

Mariela  trabaja en el comercio de venta de ropa, zapatos y perfumes, realiza las comprar en Guayaquil en las vende en un local de su casa.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería para ampliar su negocio. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueno es ponerse un  local, tener casa propia y poner un local en Salinas.
Le gusta bailar.
texts.en:
Mariela Colombia  A. G. is 31 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and one of her sons.  They live in the Ventanas region of the Los Ríos province.   They have two children.

Mariela is a member of the rural district La Esperanza which is located 25 kilometers from Ventanas.  It is a community where most people are involved in business.  This group meets every month in the San Vicente sector.

Mariela works selling clothing, shoes and perfumes.  She makes her purchases in Guayaquil and sells the goods out of her home.

She is soliciting a loan in order to buy merchandise to expand her business.  The loan will also give her the financial boost to supply her basic necessities.  Her dream is to own a small store in Salinas and have her own home.  

She loves to dance.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to expand her business.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
El señor Simon  vive en casa propia en la zona de Villa de las nieves de la ciudad de La Paz, esta casado tiene dos niños de 10 y 5 años de edad que están en colegio; Simon  trabaja como empleado en una empresa de venta de papeles donde percibe un sueldo mínimo, que apenas le alcanza para la subsistencia de la familia.

El crédito que solicita es para la compra de un equipo de amplificación, con el cual quiere poner un negocio de servicio de música para reuniones y fiestas, y  así mejorar sus ingresos.

Es cliente antiguo de Impro y tiene un historial de pagos  muy bueno, por lo tanto puede acceder a un nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Simon lives in his own home in the neighborhood of Villa de las Nieves in the city of La Paz. He's married and has two children, 10-and-5-years-old, who are currently in elementary school. Simon works for a paper company and he receives the minimum wage, which barely provides subsistence for his family. 

The loan he's requesting is for the purchase of a sound system, which he wants to use to start a DJ service for meetings and parties, thereby increasing his income.

He's worked with Impro a long time and he has a good payment history, which is why he's able to access a new loan.

loans.use: Purchase of a sound system to start a DJ service
